text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia meijeri is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The size of the shell varies between 1.5 mm and 1.8 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Mauritania.
text.External links:
"Odostomia (Odostomia) meijeri". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 14 November 2011.
